## add() function

Sum of two numbers

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function add(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description    |
| --------- | ------ | -------------- |
| a         | number | the first num  |
| b         | number | the second num |

**Returns:**

number

sum of two numbers

## Remarks

This is a remark

## Example

```ts
import { add } from "my-ts-lib";
const sum = add(1, 2); // 3
```
